Plot: Two young brothers are drawn into an intergalactic adventure when their house is hurled through the depths of space by the magical board game they are playing.
Title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
Writer: Chris Van Allsburg (book), David Koepp (screenplay), John Kamps (screenplay)
Actors: Jonah Bobo, Josh Hutcherson, Dax Shepard, Kristen Stewart
tomatoConsensus: Dazzling special effects for the kids + well-crafted storytelling for the 'rents = cinematic satisfaction for the whole family.
